abstract: Judge Susan Richard Nelson denies NHL motion to dismiss case brought by retired players who accuse league of concealing risks of repeated hits to head and promoting violence on ice.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Minnesota, Susan Richard Nelson, denied the league’s motions in litigation by retired hockey players who accused it of concealing the risks of repeated head trauma.

headline.main: Judge Rejects N.H.L.’s Bid to Dismiss Concussion Suit
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Loses Bid to Dismiss Concussion Suit

snippet: A federal judge in Minnesota, Susan Richard Nelson, denied the league’s motions in litigation by retired hockey players who accused it of concealing the risks of repeated head trauma.
